body:
When I try to install forge in my minecraft versions, this happens : http://imgur.com/a/KeiqU I have tried downloading forge again but it just doesn't work. If you can help fix this it would be highly appreciated.

-Ryan

Also, can you send me a screenshot of your mods folder on skype, so I can take a look.

replies.body: Ok, so when I installed forge, it was kind of like optifine. A thing game up I set the settings and it then loaded. I had created a seprate mods folder, which I then out forge, and any mods that were comepatable with Forge.

replies.body: By looking into your issue it seems that Forge is failing to download some of your files. I found a YouTube video which should solve your problem here.

replies.body:
Delete .minecraft and reinstall maybe?

Just put your mods and packs in a folder and do it.
